channel.title: One Simple Question - Please Answer!
channel.description:
I load up MoparScape 3.1 w/ Aryan and I goto log in but it says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "start server" to make your own".
So I click Start Server and then it says: "The server has not started. In order to run this server from this button, you must start MoparScape using the Batch File"
Ok, so I goto click on the Batch File and a program comes up saying " 'javac' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue"
So, I press a key to continue but the program just goes off and nothing happens.
Please helP!

item.title: One Simple Question - Please Answer!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Uninstall the java you have now, then go to java.com and install the latest one. That should fix your problems.

Read full topic

item.title: One Simple Question - Please Answer!
item.dc:creator: @sidvicious sidvicious
item.description:
@sidvicious wrote:

I load up MoparScape 3.1 w/ Aryan and I goto log in but it says “Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “cancel” then “start server” to make your own”.

So I click Start Server and then it says: “The server has not started. In order to run this server from this button, you must start MoparScape using the Batch File”

Ok, so I goto click on the Batch File and a program comes up saying " ‘javac’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue"

So, I press a key to continue but the program just goes off and nothing happens.

Please helP!

Read full topic
